/usr/bin/g++   -std=c++11 -std=gnu++11 -fopenmp -fopenmp -mcmodel=large -std=c++11 -std=gnu++11 -fopenmp -std=c++11 -std=gnu++11 -fopenmp -I/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.2.174/linux/mpi/intel64/include -I/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.2.174/linux/mpi/intel64/include -mavx -mf16c -fopenmp -O3 -O3 -DNDEBUG     -mcmodel=large   -L/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.2.174/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/release_mt -L/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.2.174/linux/mpi/intel64/lib -L/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.2.174/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/release_mt -L/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.2.174/linux/mpi/intel64/lib -fopenmp -rdynamic CMakeFiles/test_heapsort.exe.dir/test_heapsort.cpp.o  -o test_heapsort.exe  -L/home/frederik/Codes/GridInst/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/frederik/Codes/GridInst/lib ../src/lib_RADIATIVE_TRANSFER.a lib_TEST_RT_MAIN.a ../../lib_LINES.a ../src/lib_RADIATIVE_TRANSFER.a ../../lib_LINES.a ../src/HEALPix/lib_HEALPix.a -lGrid -lmpicxx -lmpifort -lmpi -lmpigi -ldl -lrt -lpthread -lmpicxx -lmpifort -lmpi -lmpigi -ldl -lrt -lpthread -lnuma -lz -lstdc++ -lm -lz -lnuma
